org.cornutum.tcases.openapi

Class OpenApiUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.openapi.OpenApiUtils

  • public final class OpenApiUtils
extends Object
    Defines methods for accessing an OpenAPI definition.

    • Method Summary

      static Example componentExampleRef(OpenAPI api, String reference)

      When the given reference is non-null, returns the component header referenced.

      • ifApplicableStyle

        public static String ifApplicableStyle(String style,
                                       String in,
                                       String type)
                                throws InvalidStyleException
        Returns the given parameter "style" property if it is applicable for the given parameter "in" and "type" properties. Otherwise, throws an InvalidStyleException.
        Throws:
        InvalidStyleException
